name: Tenuta Castel Venezze - Agriturismo Ca' Venezze

reviews.text: The property is lovely and the Contessa is very charming. We (two couples) stayed in Apartment Mora - a spacious two bedroom separate building for 810 Euros/week. The furnishings were simple but adequate, the beds were comfortable, and the bathrooms were very nice (note that one of the baths is handicap accessible and somewhat less charming than the other). Breackfast was excellent and the two dinners we had on the property were both excellent (make sure to warn the Contessa about your meal plans) Venice was about an hour away either by car/vaporetto, by train or by boat from nearby Chioggia.

description: Are you looking for a holiday in an oasis of peace and nature?Do you wish to stay in the middle of the countryside but also near some of the most beautiful cities of art in Italy?Castel Venezze is a delicious countryside relais obtained in a Venetian Villa of the fifteenth-century. The beautiful antiques furniture and ornaments of the apartments and rooms reflect the elegant style of its age. It is the ideal destination for a pleasant and relaxing rural stay , in an oasis full of history and charm, surrounded by the greenery of 200 hectares of fields and woods. Ecological swimming pool available from May to SeptemberIts strategic location allows you to discover all the main cities of art in the North-East of Italy, like: Venice, Verona, Padua, Ferrara, Bologna, Ravenna, the natural treasures in the Po Delta, the medieval towns on the Euganean Hills ...and much more.Horse Riding Centre just 5 min. away, Kayak Club 15 min., a nice Golf Course is at just 6 Km. There are some more Acivities and Excursions you can do during your stay at Tenuta Castel Venezze...For lovers of Italian food, we offer a unique hands-on opportunity to participate in small groups in a cooking holiday experience. The local women of Veneto will share their techniques, special ingredients, and family recipes. And you'll join them a tavola to enjoy what you've prepared. We use our own fresh products like the vegetables of our garden, the eggs of our chicken for making pasta, and the best products of the day, that we find on the market.
